description: Create a thing group. Requires permission to access the CreateThingGroup action.

parameters.name: thingGroupName
parameters.description: The thing group name to create.

parameters.name: thingGroupProperties
parameters.description: The thing group properties. thingGroupDescription (string) --- The thing group description. attributePayload (dict) --- The thing group attributes in JSON format. attributes (dict) --- A JSON string containing up to three key-value pair in JSON format. For example: {\"attributes\":{\"string1\":\"string2\"}} (string) --- (string) --- merge (boolean) --- Specifies whether the list of attributes provided in the AttributePayload is merged with the attributes stored in the registry, instead of overwriting them. To remove an attribute, call UpdateThing with an empty attribute value.

nested_params.name: attributePayload
nested_params.description: The thing group attributes in JSON format.

nested_params.name: attributes
nested_params.description: A JSON string containing up to three key-value pair in JSON format. For example: {\"attributes\":{\"string1\":\"string2\"}}

nested_params.name: merge
nested_params.description: Specifies whether the list of attributes provided in the AttributePayload is merged with the attributes stored in the registry, instead of overwriting them. To remove an attribute, call UpdateThing with an empty attribute value.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Metadata which can be used to manage the thing group. (dict) --- A set of key/value pairs that are used to manage the resource. The tag's key. Value (string) --- The tag's value.
